content: For the past few years, teenagers who imitate overweight American rappers have been walking like inverted pendulums, swinging from left to right, which is the only way forward if you weigh over two hundred and sixty pounds, but completely ineffective if you are a scrawny teenager weighing half of that, since most of the energy is wasted on side steps, not to mention the sheer absurdity of that swinging gait.
translations: ita:Negli ultimi anni, gli adolescenti che imitano dei rapper americani sovvrappeso hanno camminato come pendoli invertiti,
